name: copylink.dev
description: Browser extension that provides shortcuts to copy links. On supported sites, it creates Slack emoji-enhanced links.

scripts.build: tsc && vite build --emptyOutDir && vite build --config vite.content.config.js
scripts.build-firefox: tsc && vite build --emptyOutDir --minify false --mode firefox && vite build --config vite.content.config.js --minify false --mode firefox

author: wintorse
